function.description: Returns an integer higher or equal to startPos of the index of string2 in string1. Returns -1 if the index could not be found.

example.title: Usage
example.code:
use System, String;
System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test")); // Result: 3 System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test", 3)); // Result: 3 System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test", 5)); // Result: 7 System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "foo")); // Result: -1
